project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Develop a quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of their score, and displays the final score at the end of the game. The questions and answers will be stored in a variable within the code.

task.name: Define the quiz questions and answers in a variable
Implement the function to display questions and get user input
Implement the logic to keep track of the user's score
Implement the function to display the final score to the user
Write tests for each of the functions implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
